title: 18: Rev. Al Sharpton
itunes:title: Rev. Al Sharpton
description: Joe and Reverend Al discuss the dramatic conclusion of Ahmaud Arbery’s case, the Rev’s journey from rabble rouser to racial reconciliation, how Joe and Al’s close friendship grew out of a political fight, and why the Rev pushes back on what he calls “latte liberals”.
itunes:author: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
dc:creator: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
